release_note: Manual language selection now available. Enhanced audio engine with prompt support for names unique spellings and unfamiliar terms. Prompt now supports transcript formatting and punctuation preferences. MP4 video transcription support added. Bug Fixes: Fixed issue related to importing corrupted or silent audio files. Various other improvements and bug resolutions.

New Features: Paragraphs: Transcripts now split into natural paragraphs. Auto Transcribe: Recordings transcribed automatically. Improved Accuracy: Enhanced model yields higher accuracy. Bug Fixes: Better automatic language detection. Resolved an issue where incoming phone calls might hide recordings. Missing files are labeled as Recovered Recording . Fixed lock screen audio scrubbing issue. Miscellaneous bug fixes and enhancements.

Added AI Transformations. Turn transcripts into: summaries emails blog posts and more. Added AI generated recording titles Improved playback UI. Tapping the transcript seeks playback time to the selected text. Added the ability to pause resume recordings. Added option to re transcribe files. Other Interface improvements. Added a monthly subscription for Ultra 9.99 month for unlimited transcription
Patches a bug related to renaming files with special characters.
Allow exporting of audio files. Resolved visual issues that could occur on older devices.
Improvements to user interface speed optimizations
Improvements to onboarding experience bug fixes.
